attributes.title: Uhm just no
attributes.review:
First of all when I got this app it hacked my phone and on top of that I just got and it took all my apps off and ruined my phone plus trump is horrible and if you support him you have nothing better to do but support an opaloopa,baldheaded,sphere,shaped like my door looking orange period 

ps:if y’all don’t bring Obama back😡

attributes.title: not good beware
attributes.review: it’s absolutely horrifying to see an app like this horrible. First off I went to install the app immediately after they called me telling me I need to give them one of my chicken nuggie and I will absolutely not give them one I already downloaded the app why do I have to give a chicken nuggie too 😠😡😤🤬 HORRIBLE APP!!

attributes.title: Ruined my phone and data
attributes.review: Once I opened the app I received an email but I hadn’t even entered it yet!!! I absolutely LOVE our non-racist, non-homophobic president but I am very very very very sad to say, this app made me want to throw a brick at his left kneecap, see him get hit by a bus, thrown into a pit of manure, and die suffering in the hospital. Other than that, I love this app!!!! 🧚🏻✨🧚🏻✨💕🧚🏻✨

attributes.title: Sksksk
attributes.review: Downloaded the app was excited to use when I first started to use it kept freezing up my screen don’t know why got to the point where I my phone started getting really hot tried to install it again and did the same thing really bummed out 🥺👉👈

attributes.title: Do not download
attributes.review: I wish I could have given this app a lower rating, for the problems it has cause me and everyone else around the world. The app is not worth it, doesn’t download and I feel like it make people dumb. This app is inappropriate and disgusting it should be deleted off the App Store.☺️

attributes.title: I should have listened
attributes.review: All I wanted to do was support my president Donald J. Trump but instead I get a very poor quality app!! The app started to glitch and cause my phone to start running slower. I looked past the reviews and saw for myself the utter disappointment! Overall please don’t download it’s bad for your phone.

attributes.title: WORST app on my phone 🤬
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and noticed strange things happening on my phone. Things started deleting off my phone. All of my other apps barely worked once I downloaded because it took up so much data. It is a waste of space. If I could rate it 0 stars I would. DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: It’s a terrible app
attributes.review: It took forever to even open the app and I ain’t got time for that. The app crashes right as you open it. It’s just a waste of time. The words are also in Japanese so it’s hard to understand when the app doesn’t crash. I do but recommend getting this app?

attributes.title: Beyond worst.... terrible app
attributes.review: This app is literally a spyware that trump uses to spy on people. I feel very unsafe using this app and I recommend you guys take it off. This app is so bad that I wouldn’t even let a cockroach use it. While using this app I felt like I was being watched. This app was so just overall Terrible and scary. 🤢

attributes.title: Glitchy - DO NOT RECOMMEND
attributes.review: Downloaded this app to try and stay informed however it was so glitchy. It just kept kicking me out. I tried deleting and redownloading, closes out the application and reopening it, and even restarting my phone. Guess I’ll just stick to CNN. I honestly wish I could rate 0/5. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.
